DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether completing a computer-based program alters changes how the brain processes emotional information and improves symptoms of depression.
DOC.brief_title: Testing the Effectiveness of a Computer-based Program for Depression
DOC.criteria: Major Depressive Disorder Substance dependence, psychotic disorder, bipolar disorder, schizophrenia, current psychotherapy, medications other than selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors
